name: Poké Transporter
description: Poké Transporter is an application which can be downloaded from Pokémon Bank for free. You can transfer Pokémon from your Pokémon Black Version, Pokémon White Version, Pokémon Black Version 2, or Pokémon White Version 2 to your Pokémon Bank by using Poké Transporter. In order to transfer your Pokémon, you need to insert Pokémon Black, Pokémon White, Pokémon Black 2, or Pokémon White 2 in all the systems in Nintendo 3DS family's Game Card slot. Once you use Poké Transporter to transfer Pokémon, the Pokémon will disappear from that game and cannot be transferred back.
